title: 用户组问题
author: wangwei19832008
txt_content:
最近我的用户组好像有问题了。明明把自己放在了Owner组，但是/list 显示确实Admin组？？？还有就是，我自己建的Newplayer组，权限是我一条一条网里加的。我没又给这个组加 /res info. 但是为什么这个组还能使用这个命令
这是我的配置文件。
# Group inheritance
#
# Any inherited groups prefixed with a g: are global groups
# and are inherited from the GlobalGroups.yml.
#
# Groups without the g: prefix are groups local to this world
# and are defined in the this groups.yml file.
#
# Local group inheritances define your promotion tree when using 'manpromote/mandemote'

groups:
  Newplayer:
    default: true
    permissions:
    - eddentials.warp
    - essentials.afk
    - essentials.afk.auto
    - essentials.balance
    - essentials.chat.color
    - essentials.chat.format
    - essentials.chat.question
    - essentials.exp
    - essentials.help
    - essentials.helpop
    - essentials.ignore
    - essentials.jail.allow.help
    - essentials.jail.allow.helpop
    - essentials.jail.allow.rules
    - essentials.list
    - essentials.mail
    - essentials.mail.send
    - essentials.motd
    - essentials.msg
    - essentials.msg.color
    - essentials.msg.format
    - essentials.pay
    - essentials.ping
    - essentials.protect
    - essentials.rules
    - essentials.signs.use.*
    - essentials.spawn
    - essentials.time
    - essentials.worth
    inheritance: []
    info:
      prefix: ''
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Default:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - -bukkit.command.kill
    inheritance:
    - g:groupmanager_default
    - g:bukkit_default
    - g:essentials_default
    - g:towny_default
    info:
      prefix: '&e'
      build: false
      suffix: ''
  Builder:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - default
    - g:essentials_builder
    - g:towny_builder
    info:
      prefix: '&2'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Moderator:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - builder
    - g:groupmanager_moderator
    - g:bukkit_moderator
    - g:essentials_moderator
    - g:towny_moderator
    - g:vanish_moderator
    info:
      prefix: '&5'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Admin:
    default: false
    permissions: []
    inheritance:
    - moderator
    - g:groupmanager_admin
    - g:bukkit_admin
    - g:essentials_admin
    - g:towny_admin
    - g:vanish_admin
    info:
      prefix: '&c'
      build: true
      suffix: ''
  Owner:
    default: false
    permissions:
    - '*'
    - -vanish.*
    inheritance:
    - admin
    info:
      prefix: '&0'
      build: true
      suffix: ''

replies.author: wjtcc
replies.txt_content:
res info
这是RES插件默认设置的权限，所有人都有的吧

还有你放owner组的问题
把user.yml发上来看看就知道了
和你发的这个group.yml在一个文件夹里面的
